name: Rules of Survival
notes: Requires Facebook or mobile app for sign-in. Google sign-in does not work. Downloadable on the Google Play Store or the iOS App Store

task.description: Please wait while we install Rules of Survival
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- zip: https://g61.gdl.netease.com/ros_publish_276_publish_1.295523.315158.zip
game:
  exe: drive_c/ros/ros.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2010 wininet win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: zip
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /VERYSILENT /NOICONS
    description: Please wait while we install Rules of Survival
    exclude_processes: ros.exe
    executable: $CACHE/ros_publish_276_publish_1.295523.315158.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  overrides:
    wininet: builtin,native
